definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: It's famous for Big Ben , Buckingham Palace and Tower Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦以本钟白金汉宫和他桥而闻名。

sentences.english: London has many attractions, such as Big Ben and Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦有许多名胜，例如大笨钟和白金汉宫。

sentences.english: Then Mr Brown departed on the short ride to Buckingham Palace, to tender his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 布朗随后离开，经过一小段路后到白金汉宫递交辞呈。

sentences.english: 1230 - The bride's carriage procession arrives at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 王子夫妇乘坐的马车抵达白金汉宫。

sentences.english: It hopes to put Buckingham Palace into Street View in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 在不久的将来，白金汉宫的图片还将被收入街景地图。

sentences.english: Buckingham Palace is the royal family's London residence.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫是王室在伦敦居住。

sentences.english: The platinum temple on all sides and green tree lawn, the fresh flowers glorious , the environment very daintiness.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫四周绿树草地，鲜花锦簇，环境极其优美。

sentences.english: The palace, like Windsor Castle, is owned by the British state.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫和温莎堡一样由英国政府所有。

sentences.english: I would suggest flying the flag at half-mast above Buckingham Palace, and coming down to London at the earliest opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 我建议在白金汉宫降半旗，你们也尽快回到伦敦。

sentences.english: What's the proper gift to present Queen Elizabeth II with at Buckingham Palace?
sentences.chinese: 在白金汉宫送什么礼物给伊莉沙白二世女王好呢？

sentences.english: The platinum has Royal palace guards to stand guard before the temple.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫前有皇家禁卫军站岗。

sentences.english: She still keeps it in a drawer in her bedroom at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 自始至终，女王都把它珍藏在白金汉宫的卧室抽屉中。

sentences.english: In the UK, flags flew at half mast on government buildings and at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，政府办公楼和白金汉宫的国旗都降了半旗。

sentences.english: And Buckingham Palace is just open for the summer, so that's, that's pretty popular.
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫只在夏天开放，所以那儿相当受欢迎。

sentences.english: 1240 - Members of the Royal Family and members of foreign royal families arrive at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 英国和外国皇室成员抵达白金汉宫。

sentences.english: From 12.40pm: Other guests for the reception arrive at Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 其他客人抵达白金汉宫。

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Nu:3 wang2
Wei1 si1 min3 si1 te4 Jiao4 tang2

Te4 la1 fa3 er3 jia1 guang3 chang3

definition: Elysée Palace, the residence of the president of the French Republic
Mrs Thatcher/Baroness Thatcher or Margaret Thatcher (1925-2013), British conservative politician, prime minister 1979-1990
